h2_title: All PS5 Exclusive Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Find and defeat all four of the hidden Loong bosses. These are: Red Loong (Chapter 1), Black Loong (Chapter 2), Cyan Loong (Chapter 3), and Yellow Loong (Chapter 4).**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All PS5 Exclusive Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'The Sire and Sons'.
The content is as follows:
**Find and defeat all four of the hidden Loong bosses. These are: Red Loong (Chapter 1), Black Loong (Chapter 2), Cyan Loong (Chapter 3), and Yellow Loong (Chapter 4).**
